statements: DELETE FROM customer_biometrics WHERE fingerprint_scan IS NULL;
DELETE FROM customer_biometrics WHERE customer_id = 100 AND fingerprint_scan IS NULL;
DELETE FROM customer_biometrics WHERE fingerprint_scan = '\x12AB34CD' AND customer_id = 200;
DELETE FROM payments WHERE customer_id = 100 AND payment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND transaction_date < '2022-09-01';
DELETE FROM AuthLogs WHERE customer_id = 123 AND success = false
